title: Good in-game ping but game still attempting to reconnect
body:
For about 2 weeks now, once in game, my game suddenly stops and i get an attempting to reconnect sign on the top of my screen. I am playing through LAN connection and my ping is perfectly fine. It has been extremely frustrating and agonising. I have checked with my providers and everything is fine on their side. When i open chrome, everything loads well. I am un aware of the issue and it would be great if I could get some help.

> I am using the mac version of "League Of Legends"

replies.body: I wonder if your connection was hitting some kind of spike in packet loss if your ping was level through those disconnections. Try running this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) with one of the logs of the games that d/c'd and post a screenshot here of what it says.

Thank you for responding, i have tried the link however, it says that my ping is fine and my packet loss is below 1%. I also tried reseting my DNS address and unblocking my firewall. I will tell you how it goes.
seems whole game is fucked up. i got isues whole week and reading that lot of ppl have same problems.client fully fuckedup also ingame play.
Its honestly a shame that this is happening, i kindly ask for you to post any relevant information towards this topic, I will be doing the same :)

Sigh... I've been having this problem for 2 weeks and still haven't found a fix. 
And i'm using windows.
Please let me know if you find a way to resolve this issue.  I will be posting any information that could be useful for you!
